name: Development (Sunny Cat)
description:
This is a game project about the fact that there are no hopeless situations. You have to accept, adapt, change and maybe you will survive.

I present the layout of the first chapter - "Egg".

This chapter has no text. Only illustrations and emotions, expressed sparingly visually and more designed for subconscious perception.

The choice of actions is also minimal.

Comments and advice will influence the further development of the game.
